summary:
With his broad civil engineering knowledge & experience, Mr. Arnold provides consultancy services in the field of hydraulics (water levels & waves) and the design of hydraulic structures (flood defences, bed & bank protection, navigation locks and pumping stations). He is involved as consultant in modelling studies, risk & safety assessments and the design of flood defenses and several environmental impact studies. He gained experience in projects in the Netherlands and abroad, comprising the restoration and rehabilitation of the New Orleans flood defence system in the wake of Hurricane Katrina, design work for the third set of locks of the Panama Canal and the dike safety & risk assessment Aqua Blanca Dike along the Cauca River in Colombia. Recently he has worked in Colombia for three years on the rehabilitation of the Canal del Dique system (design of two navigation locks and a weir). 

Specialties: design of hydraulic structures, risk & safety assessments of flood defences, environmental impact studies, project management

projects:
[{'title': 'Levee System Evaluation Report (LSER)', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'description': 'Producing 400 hydraulic fact sheets specifying hydraulic boundary conditions and overtopping rates for each construction in the reach of the Greater New Orleans Hurricane and Storm Damage Risk Reduction System (HSDRRS) using the most up to date information. The hydraulic fact sheets were prepared in collaboration with engineers of the US Army Corps of Engineers in New Orleans.

Dhr. Arnold was as project manager responsible for client relations, the project team and the quality of project team deliverables.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Erik', 'last_name': 'Arnold', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Consultant at Royal HaskoningDHV'}]}, {'title': 'Canal del Dique', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'description': 'In August 2013, Fondo Adaptación Colombia assigned Royal HaskoningDHV and its partner, the Colombian engineering firm Gómez Cajiao to rehabilitate Canal del Dique. Fondo Adaptación is the public institution founded by the Colombian President, Juan Manuel Santos, for construction and restoration of infrastructure affected by La Niña 2010-2011. The consultancy services included an extensive data collection (a.o. Lidar topography, thousands km’s of bathymetric surveys, flow and sediment measurements, installation of hydrographic stations, collection of environmental data); social and environmental studies supported by modelling of water, flow, salinity, sediment transport and inundation using 1D, 2D and 3D models of the Canal and adjacent lakes, the Magdalena River and the coastal zone; planning and design of restoration measures; environmental impact assessment; inspection and reparation of dikes; design of regulation structures and river training works.

Dhr. Arnold was involved as consultant (reporting: salt intrusion and drinking water extraction from the canal, design: stilling basin of an inlet, river training works) and coordinator (technical & financial progress reports, project management, logistics, QHSE) in the project.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Erik', 'last_name': 'Arnold', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Consultant at Royal HaskoningDHV'}]}, {'title': 'Hydraulic consultancy services for US Army Corps of Engineers', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2010}}, 'description': 'This project comprised several consultancy services and project management activities for the US Army Corps of Engineers. Activities included design of flood protection works (dikes), pump station design, implementation of flood protection works, assistance in the definition of bathymetric and geotechnical surveys and review of results.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Erik', 'last_name': 'Arnold', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Consultant at Royal HaskoningDHV'}]}]
